mapper.sql: class_id, invite_code, name, avatar, course, university, department, textbook, detail, exam_shedule, population, if_open, if_allow_to_join, user_id, create_date_time, modify_date_time
mapper.select: select class.class_id, class.name, class.avatar, class.course, user.name from user, class, class_user where user.user_id = class.user_id and class.class_id = class_user.class_id and class_user.user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into class (class_id, invite_code, name, avatar, course, university, department, textbook, detail, exam_shedule, population, if_open, if_allow_to_join, user_id, create_date_time, modify_date_time) values (#{class_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invite_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{course,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{university,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textbook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exam_shedule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{population,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{if_open,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{if_allow_to_join,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{create_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modify_date_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
